sulina.name: Sulina/Bystroe Passing
sulina.text:
SULINA AND BYSTROE PASSING CHARGES FOR OWNRS ACCOUNT.
VSSL TO USE BYSTROE CHANNEL AS PRIORITY, IN CASE NOT AVAILABLE THEN SULINA CHANNEL.

air_raids.name: Air Raid Alerts
air_raids.text: TIME LOST DUE TO WAR/AIR RAID ALERTS NOT TO COUNT AS L/T

jcc.name: JCC Inspection & ERWI
jcc.text:
VSSL TO PASS INSPECTION BY JCC (JOINT COORDINATION CENTER) IN ISTANBUL PRIOR TO LOADING IN UKRAINE.

ERWI - EXTENDED RUSSIA/UKRAINE WAR INSURANCE FOR OWNRS ACCOUNT

cancellation.name: Corridor Cancellation
cancellation.text: CHRTS HAVE OPTION TO CANCEL THIS C/P FREE OF CONSEQUENCES IN CASE MARITIME CORRIDOR TO UKRAINIAN PORTS CLOSED BY UKRAINIAN OR RUSSIAN AUTHORITIES

nor_hours.name: NOR Office Hours Egypt
nor_hours.text: AT DISCHARGE PORT N.O.R. TO BE TENDERED ON WORKING DAYS DURING OFFICE HRS (08:00-12:00 HRS) FROM SUNDAY TO THURSDAY

sampling.name: Egyptian Sampling
sampling.text: AT DISCHARGE PORT SAMPLING CARRIED OUT AS PER EGYPTIAN LAWS AND REGULATIONS. TIME FOR SAMPLING NOT TO COUNT AS L/T.

previous_cargo.name: Previous Cargo Restrictions
previous_cargo.text:
LAST 3 CARGOES: CLEAN/HARMLESS/ODORLESS ONLY.
NO FERTILIZERS, CHEMICALS, COAL, OR OTHER CONTAMINATING CARGOES

trimming.name: Trimming Requirements
trimming.text: CARGO TO BE PROPERLY TRIMMED, LEVELED AND STOWED IN ACCORDANCE WITH IMSBC CODE

surveyor.name: Surveyor Access
surveyor.text: CHRTS/RCVRS/SHPRS SURVEYORS TO HAVE FREE AND UNRESTRICTED ACCESS TO VSSL AND HOLDS AT LOAD AND DISCHARGE PORTS FOR INSPECTION, SAMPLING AND SUPERVISION

documents_eiu.name: Documents Time EIU
documents_eiu.text: TIME FROM ALL ONBOARD DOCS READY AND UP TO COMPLETION OF DISCHARGING EIU

nor_ukraine.name: NOR Office Hours Ukraine
nor_ukraine.text: AT LOAD PORT N.O.R. TO BE TENDERED ON WORKING DAYS DURING OFFICE HRS (08:00-17:00 HRS) FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY

laytime_start.name: Laytime Commencement
laytime_start.text: L/T TO COMMENCE 0800 HRS LT NEXT WORKING DAY AFTER VALID N.O.R. TENDERED, VSSL MOORED A.B.A.L.D.

berth_restrictions.name: Berth Restrictions
berth_restrictions.text: OWNRS SATSFY THEMSLVS WITH ANY KIND OF LOADING BERTH/PORT/CHANNEL/RIVER RESTRICTIONS

gsba.name: Good Safe Berth
gsba.text: GSB(A): GOOD SAFE BERTH ALWAYS AFLOAT

demurrage.name: Demurrage
demurrage.text: DEMURRAGE: USD {RATE} PDPR FD BENDS (LESS BROKERAGE COMMISSION)

demurrage_detention.name: Demurrage/Detention (Ukraine)
demurrage_detention.text: DEMURRAGE/DETENTION: USD {RATE} PDPR FD BENDS (LESS BROKERAGE COMMISSION)

proforma.name: Proforma Reference
proforma.text: OWISE AS PER ATTACHED CHRTS PROFORMA CP, BASED ON SYNACOMEX 2000 C/P, LOGICALLY AMENDED AS PER MAIN TERMS AGREED (WHICH ALWAYS PREVAIL)
